title: Needs better ways to import data
text:
This app would be great if it made it easier to add tracking numbers. For many reasons‚Äîincluding that I have a large number of email addresses‚ÄîI can‚Äôt simply give it access to my email account. And if I did, it would only pick up emails to one address. Providing the app with my primary email address only goes so far; while that address gets more shipping notifications than any other address, it‚Äôs far from a majority.

The app would be much better if it could do two things: (1) provide each user with a unique email to which the user can forward relevant emails (compare to Evernote or Todoist) and (2) pick out multiple tracking numbers from a single, copy-pasted block of text. Neither of these features is terribly complex in the grand scheme, but either would make this app much more usable for me.
